text: Ic Byrhteh biscop mid Godes geðeahte & þæs arwyrðan hiredes on Wigernaceastre & on ealre þæra ðegena gewitnysse into Glæaweceastrescire, ic cyþe þæt ic gean Wulmære minum cnihte twegra hida landes in Easttune for his godra gearnunge swa ful & swa forð swa he hit hæfde under Leofsige biscop.
& under me syðþan hæbbe he & wel bruce þreora manna dæg to rihtere geyrsumnysse into ðære halgan stowe to Wigernaceastre butan he hit forwyrce.
Ðæs is to gewitnysse, se hired on Wigraceastre & on Glæaweceastre & on Eofeshom & on Prescoran.
